evidence.claim: APEX Rehab Group uses AWS cloud services for infrastructure.
The company is HIPAA compliant, ensuring data privacy standards.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs which facilitate interactions with EHRs.
Support for X12 transaction sets is implemented for health insurance claims.
APEX Rehab Group mentions utilizing HL7 protocols in their systems.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 837 and HIPAA compliance, indicating strong alignment with healthcare data exchange needs.
